Ruelrond Honadarr was the Master Shipwright and builder of Honadarrs Unsinkable Hulks from the city of Hlath in the Vilhon Reach, active in the late 15 century DR.
Ruelrond was a famed shipbuilder among sailors for creating large wide-hulled vessels, resistant to capsizing. Honadarrs Unsinkable Hulks were treated with fire-resistant substances and were virtually impossible to sink. Ruelrond Honadarrs critics claimed that the Hulks "sailed sideways" and had "all the grace of a bloated dead ox carcass."
